character.name: Matt Currier
character.tagline: Engineering leader & eclecticist — hardware, firmware, software, and everything in between

milestones.title: Origin: The First Computer
milestones.summary: Watched dad solder a Zenith H89 CP/M machine at age 4. Wumpus was the first game.
milestones.description: From a multi-plan spreadsheet to BASIC, then C and Pascal — the journey into computing began with curiosity and a soldering iron.

quests.name: First Program
quests.outcome: Discovered the magic of making machines do what you tell them.

milestones.title: IT & Medical Software
milestones.summary: Built medical office systems, scripts, and networks at ACS Online.
milestones.description: Created Medical Manager scripts, refactored government reporting templates for pediatrics clinics, and architected medical office computer record systems.

quests.name: Medical Office Systems
quests.objective: Architect and build record systems for medical offices.
quests.outcome: Delivered working systems with PC/server specs and networking.

milestones.title: The Oilfield: Directional Drilling
milestones.summary: Nearly a decade of directional drilling, from rig hand to leading teams.
milestones.description: Started as a rig hand on Nabors #909 in the Piceance Basin, then joined Scientific Drilling for directional work — Shell ERDD, Anadarko gas wells, Barrick mine-shaft freeze walls. Led teams, selected tools, and built custom reports.

quests.name: Shell ERDD HLT
quests.objective: Drill 60-degree slant well and horizontal wells for oil-shale recovery testing.
quests.outcome: Achieved drilling targets despite fluid composition and prototype technique setbacks.

quests.name: Barrick Freeze Wall
quests.objective: Drill 36 wells in a ring with 2-foot spacing tolerances.
quests.outcome: Overcame extreme rheology challenges and tight tolerances to complete the freeze wall.

milestones.title: Web Developer: Paragon Era
milestones.summary: Designed databases, built full-stack web apps, and worked with hospitals and schools.
milestones.description: Built a charter school web application covering learning plans, grading, transcripts, and document management with electronic signing. Helped architect a document control system for a hospital network.

quests.name: Charter School App
quests.objective: Build a web app for learning plans, grading, transcripts, and compliance.
quests.outcome: Delivered a comprehensive system with document management and electronic signing.

quests.name: Hospital Doc Control
quests.objective: Architect document control for Sisters of Charity hospital network.
quests.outcome: Built change tracking, storage, and revision workflows.

milestones.title: Controls Engineer
milestones.summary: PLC automation, robotic drilling rigs, and SCADA systems for offshore operations.
milestones.description: Developed advanced PLC control systems at Aker Solutions/MHWirth/AFGlobal. Built Hardware-in-Loop simulators, subsea mux systems, and SCADA software for land and offshore drilling rigs.

quests.name: Robotic Drilling Rig
quests.objective: Design control system for robotic drilling machinery.
quests.outcome: Delivered automation controller libraries for command processing, sequencing, and I/O.

quests.name: Subsea Mux System
quests.objective: Create PLC-based multiplexer for subsea distributed control.
quests.outcome: Built system supporting direct-hydraulic, remote hydraulic, and mechanical modes.

milestones.title: OsteoStrong & Turing Automations
milestones.summary: Founded Turing Automations. Engineered osteogenic automation systems with 6 patents.
milestones.description: Developed hardware and software for automating OsteoStrong skeletal therapy machines. Created distributed database systems, self-service kiosks, and manufacturing processes. 6 patent applications (2 issued, 4 pending).

quests.name: Osteogenic Automation
quests.objective: Automate OsteoStrong skeletal therapy machines with sensors, PLCs, and software.
quests.outcome: 6 patent applications filed, 2 issued. Deployed world-wide distributed control systems.

quests.name: Spectrum
quests.objective: Build an interactive, reactive osteogenic system that visualizes force production.
quests.outcome: Created an audio-reactive LED lighting and embedded control visualization system.
